title: Grenadier: Hohoemi no Senshi (Grenadier: The Beautiful Warrior)
synopsis: Rushuna is a blonde and very beautiful Senshi (gun expert) that travels through the world with one purpose. Which is to make the world a peaceful place by, instead of fighting with weapons, taking away the people's will to fight by giving them a smile. Although she doesn't want to fight, she is forced to, and shows amazing gun skills. In this journey she meets Yajirou, a mercenary that uses a sword to fight and joins her on her journey.
characters: ['Tendou, Rushuna', 'Kojima, Yajirou', 'Aizen, Teppa', 'Kurenai, Mikan', 'Kurenai, Touka', 'Tenshi', 'Furon', 'Doshi, Kaizan', 'Shirato, Fuuka', 'Hakubi, Shinnoshin']
